title: Ep. 263: Ask a Cosmetic Chemist with Ron Robinson (Replay)
itunes:title: Ep. 263: Ask a Cosmetic Chemist with Ron Robinson (Replay)
itunes:subtitle: Cosmetic chemist and founder of BeautyStat Ron Robinson answers your biggest questions about product formulation, “clean” beauty, essential oils, where to find unbiased product info online, and more. This episode features a new introduction and Raise A...
description:
Cosmetic chemist and founder of BeautyStat Ron Robinson answers your biggest questions about product formulation, “clean” beauty, essential oils, where to find unbiased product info online, and more. This episode features a new introduction and Raise A Wand segment, but the interview previously aired (episode 171). We’ll be back next week with all new episodes for 2021! -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
